name: 妄想症 Deliver Me
summary: The Game 'Paranoia: Deliver Me' is created by the Novel 'WangXiangZheng Paranoia' from Yuli. It is an AVG game about youth and college. The story is about one girl named Lingluo who is trying her best to pursue the music dream. She lost her best friends and her confidence, then she was locked inside her own imaginations. Finally, she fought againest her 'Paranoia Personality' bravely and escaped from the Paranoia world. She came back to the real life and rebuild the dream. Of course, she also met her best friend with happniess at the end.
